questions.question: What is the empirical formula of tp-PMBB-6?
What method was used for the absorption correction in the single-crystal X-ray diffraction analysis of tp-PMBB-6?
What is the crystal system and space group of tp-PMBB-5-acs-1?
What are the BET and Langmuir surface areas of tp-PMBB-5-acs-1 as determined from CO2 adsorption at 195 K?
questions.answer: BET surface area is 710 m2/g and Langmuir surface area is 909 m2/g

questions.question: What is the isosteric heat of adsorption (Qst) for CO2 exhibited by tp-PMBB-6-stp-1 at zero coverage?
Based on the synthesis conditions, which material shows no shifts in peak positions upon heating under vacuum or immersing in solvents?
Considering the synthesis conditions, which material has free NH2 groups oriented toward the interior of its channels?
Is the statement 'tp-PMBB-5-acs-1 exhibits breathing upon heating under vacuum' true or false?
True or False: The [Cu3(µ3-Cl)(RNH2)6Cl6] molecular building block has been widely used in the synthesis of metal-organic materials before the study.
True or False: The BET surface area of tp-PMBB-6-stp-1 is higher than that of tp-PMBB-5-acs-1.
What is the crystal system and space group of tp-PMBB-6-stp-1?
What is the role of NH2 groups in the structure of tp-PMBB-6-stp-1?
questions.answer: They serve as 4-c and 6-c nodes, resulting in a square trigonal prismatic (stp) net.

questions.question: True or False: tp-PMBB-5-acs-1 and tp-PMBB-6-stp-1 have the same underlying net topology.
What is the initial isosteric heat of adsorption (Qst) for CO2 exhibited by tp-PMBB-5-acs-1?
True or False: The presence of free amino groups in tp-PMBB-6-stp-1 results in a lower initial isosteric heat of adsorption for CO2 compared to tp-PMBB-5-acs-1.
Considering the synthesis conditions, which material's structure contains solvent accessible voids possibly containing disordered nitrate anions?
True or False: The [Cu3(µ3-Cl)(RNH2)6Cl6] molecular building block in tp-PMBB-5-acs-1 is 5-coordinate.
What is the reason for the rigidity of tp-PMBB-5-acs-1 according to the synthesis conditions?
questions.answer: The rigidity might be attributable to the NH3...Cl- hydrogen bonds in the [Cu3(µ3-Cl)(RNH2)6Cl6] MBBs.

questions.question: True or False: The synthesis of tp-PMBB-6-stp-1 involves a solvothermal reaction.
Based on the synthesis conditions, which material has a higher Langmuir surface area as determined from CO2 adsorption at 195 K?
